title: Privacy/Marketing Preferences (Consent)
description: This schema captures privacy, personalization and marketing preferences (consents).

choice.title: Choice Value
choice.description: The value specified by the user as their preference

basisOfProcessing.title: Basis Of Processing
basisOfProcessing.description: Legal basis for collecting/processing data: is user consent required?

timestamp.title: Preference timestamp
timestamp.description: Time this specific preference was collected.

source.title: Preference Source
source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this preference value

version.title: Consent Schema Version
version.description: Version of the Consents and Preferences Schema

timestamp.title: Consent/Preferences timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp of this complete set of user consents and preferences

source.title: Preference Source
source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this preference value

userCountryRegionCode.title: User Country (and optionally Region) Code
userCountryRegionCode.description: ISO 3166 alpha2 country code or ISO 3166-2 country plus state/province code for use in helping to determine how to interpret consent values

countryRegionSource.title: Country/Region Source
countryRegionSource.description: Method used to determine the user's country/region
